PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-00471990-01-180,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the SHIP-SOURCE OIL POLLUTION FUND REGULATIONS which (a) specify the circumstances under which persons receiving oil must supply required information to the Canadian Coast Guard and (b) repeal the former Maritime Pollution Claims Fund Regulations (C.R.C., c. 1444).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1990-0082 Publication Date: 1990-01-31
